devdoc.author: Julien Niset - <julien@argent.im>Olivier Van Den Biggelaar - <olivier@argent.im>
devdoc.details: Module to manage the guardians of wallets. Guardians are accounts (EOA or contracts) that are authorized to perform specific security operations on wallets such as toggle a safety lock, start a recovery procedure, or confirm transactions. Addition or revokation of guardians is initiated by the owner of a wallet and must be confirmed after a security period (e.g. 24 hours). The list of guardians for a wallet is stored on a saparate contract to facilitate its use by other modules.

addGuardian(address,address).details: Lets the owner add a guardian to its wallet. The first guardian is added immediately. All following additions must be confirmed by calling the confirmGuardianAddition() method.

addModule(address,address).details: Adds a module to a wallet. First checks that the module is registered.

cancelGuardianAddition(address,address).details: Lets the owner cancel a pending guardian addition.

cancelGuardianRevokation(address,address.details: Lets the owner cancel a pending guardian revokation.

confirmGuardianAddition(address,address).details: Confirms the pending addition of a guardian to a wallet. The method must be called during the confirmation window and can be called by anyone to enable orchestration.

confirmGuardianRevokation(address,addres.details: Confirms the pending revokation of a guardian to a wallet. The method must be called during the confirmation window and can be called by anyone to enable orchestration.

params._data: The data for the relayed transaction
params._gasLimit: The gas limit to use for the gas refund.
params._gasPrice: The gas price to use for the gas refund.
params._nonce: The nonce used to prevent replay attacks.
params._signatures: The signatures as a concatenated byte array.

getGuardians(address).details: Get the active guardians for a wallet.
getGuardians(address).return: the active guardians for a wallet.

getNonce(address).details: Gets the current nonce for a wallet.

guardianCount(address).details: Counts the number of active guardians for a wallet.
guardianCount(address).return: the number of active guardians for a wallet.

init(address).details: Inits the module for a wallet by logging an event. The method can only be called by the wallet itself.

isGuardian(address,address).details: Checks if an address is a guardian for a wallet.
isGuardian(address,address).return: true if the address if a guardian for the wallet.

recoverToken(address).details: Utility method enbaling anyone to recover ERC20 token sent to the module by mistake and transfer them to the Module Registry.

revokeGuardian(address,address).details: Lets the owner revoke a guardian from its wallet. Revokation must be confirmed by calling the confirmGuardianRevokation() method.

devdoc.title: GuardianManager
